page.title: 18Police work in Toppesfield
page.content: The Community Police Officer for Stam- bourne,Toppesfield and the surrounding villages is P.c Wojcik. He lives in Gt Yeldham and travels around his area in an Austin Maestro car.In addition to his car radio,he carries a small personal radio and is able to keep in direct contact with Police Headquart- ers at Chelmsford.The most common crimes in the district are petty theft and vandalism. If needed the finger- print and photographic departments,the C.I.D, Police dogs or traffic Police can be called in at short notice.An important part of community police work is crime and accident prevention and P.c.Wojcik visits local schools to explain about Police work and to help in road safety training. Local police officers work 8-hour shifts and cover adjoining districts when the officer responsible is off-duty.
